overview_of_class: This is a research and writing seminar required of all first-year History PhD students. Students will survey historical methods, complete bibliographic assignments, identify a research topic, and begin research and writing.
name: Research Seminar in History
title: WCAS HISTORY 570-2-20 Research Seminar in History
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Graduate Students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is a research and writing seminar required of all first-year History PhD students. Students will survey historical methods, complete bibliographic assignments, identify a research topic, and begin research and writing.

subject: HISTORY
